title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
I have a macbook pro 13" with no backlight.
Everything else is working well.

My measurements:

backlight fuse: 12.55v
LVDS pin 21 and pin22: 12.54v
C9020 pin1: 12.52
C9020 pin2: 0.0

Board looks good under the microscope. I ultrasonic cleaned it and I slightly reflowed U9701.

Any hint at this point?

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message: Do you have image on the screen?? is yes check continuity between cathode of D9701 and ball A5 of U9701.....

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 29427"]Do you have image on the screen?? is yes check continuity between cathode of D9701 and ball A5 of U9701.....[/QUOTE]

Hi, Thanks for the reply,

I have image on the display.
There is[B] continuity[/B] between cathode of D9701 and ball A5 of U9701.

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 29439"]Voltage on BKL_PWM and BKL_EN???[/QUOTE]

BKL_PWM:  3.290v

BKL_EN:    3.100v

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message: all seems to be ok but U9701 is not boosting, replace U9701, when take off the IC, confirm continuity on feedback line.....

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 29444"]all seems to be ok but U9701 is not boosting, replace U9701, when take off the IC, confirm continuity on feedback line.....[/QUOTE]

I have replaced the u9701. Same result! no backlight but I have image

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message: DId you confirm comtinuity on feedback line???

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 29449"]DId you confirm comtinuity on feedback line???[/QUOTE]

I did it before replacing the u9701

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message: Diode mode on the BKL output line? D9701 check for short? All the voltages are there so it must be in the U9701 boost circuit.

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 29460"]Diode mode on the BKL output line? D9701 check for short? All the voltages are there so it must be in the U9701 boost circuit. [/QUOTE]

Hi, I don't know where can I get the measurement for "Diode mode on the BKL output line" 
I did the diode mode between pin 21 and 22 and the ground and voltage drop is 0.605v
The is no short on D9701

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message: Too high. Is there continuity beteeen the two SW pads of u9701 and pin 2 of l9701?

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
[QUOTE="larossmann, post: 29526"]Too high. Is there continuity beteeen the two SW pads of u9701 and pin 2 of l9701?[/QUOTE]

Hi,
No continuity between PPBUS_SW_LCDBKLT_PWR_SW and pin 2 of l9701.
No continuity between PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT_FB and pin 2 of l9701.

title: MacBook Pro 13" 820-3115
message:
No continuity between PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT_FB and pin 2 of l9701, look at diagram and tell me if this is correct or not.
Need to check continuity between LP8550 pin B1,B2  and L9701. Also pin A5 to D9701 K cathode.
